title: Predator
description: A team of elite commandos, led by Major Dutch Schaefer, is sent on a mission to rescue hostages in a Central American jungle, only to be hunted by a technologically advanced alien warrior.

title: Commando
description: John Matrix, a retired special forces operative, is forced back into action when mercenaries kidnap his daughter, leading him on a relentless mission of revenge.

title: True Lies
description: A secret agent, whose wife and family are unaware of his double life, must stop a terrorist plot while also dealing with his marriage problems in this action-comedy thriller.

title: Total Recall
description: A construction worker discovers his memories have been altered and embarks on a journey to Mars to uncover his true identity while fighting against a corrupt corporate regime.

title: Twins
description: A genetically engineered, intelligent but naive man discovers he has a long-lost twin brother, leading to a hilarious adventure as they reconnect and uncover the truth about their origins.

title: Kindergarten Cop
description: A tough cop goes undercover as a kindergarten teacher to catch a dangerous criminal, leading to comedic chaos as he struggles to handle young children while solving his case.

title: The Terminator
description: A cyborg assassin is sent from the future to kill Sarah Connor, whose unborn child will lead the resistance against a machine uprising, while a soldier is sent to protect her.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
description: A reprogrammed Terminator is sent back in time to protect young John Connor from a more advanced liquid-metal assassin, leading to an epic battle for the future of humanity.

title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
description: John Connor is once again hunted by a new, deadly female Terminator, while an aging T-800 is sent to protect him, leading to the inevitable rise of the machine war.

title: Terminator Salvation
description: Set in a post-apocalyptic future, John Connor leads the resistance against Skynet while encountering a mysterious man with a hidden past that may change the fate of the war.

title: Terminator: Genisys
description: When Kyle Reese is sent back in time to protect Sarah Connor, he finds himself in an altered timeline where she is already aware of her fate, leading to a new battle against Skynet.

title: Terminator: Dark Fate
description: Sarah Connor and a cybernetically enhanced soldier team up to protect a young woman from a new, advanced Terminator, leading to a final confrontation with Skynet's successor.

title: Jingle All the Way
description: A father frantically searches for a sold-out action figure on Christmas Eve, leading to a series of comedic mishaps as he competes with another desperate dad.

title: Escape Plan
description: A security expert, known for breaking out of prisons, is trapped in a high-tech facility and must team up with a fellow inmate to orchestrate his greatest escape.

title: The Last Stand
description: A small-town sheriff must stop a dangerous cartel leader from escaping across the border, leading to a thrilling standoff in this action-packed comeback film.

title: Pumping Iron
description: A documentary following Arnold Schwarzenegger and other bodybuilders as they prepare for the 1975 Mr. Olympia and Mr. Universe competitions, showcasing the world of professional bodybuilding.

title: Hercules in New York
description: Hercules, bored with Mount Olympus, travels to New York City, where he experiences comedic culture shock while trying to prove his godly strength.

title: Aftermath
description: A man seeks justice after losing his family in a tragic airline accident, leading to a tense and emotional journey of grief and revenge.

title: The Expendables
description: A team of elite mercenaries is hired to overthrow a ruthless dictator, leading to an explosive mission filled with intense action and high-stakes battles.

title: The Expendables 2
description: The Expendables are back on a new mission to recover a deadly weapon, but when one of their own is killed, the team sets out for vengeance against a ruthless arms dealer.

title: The Expendables 3
description: As the team faces off against a former ally turned arms dealer, they must recruit a new generation of mercenaries to take down their most dangerous enemy yet.

title: Top Gun
description: A hotshot Navy fighter pilot, Pete 'Maverick' Mitchell, must face his inner demons and the harsh realities of combat as he competes to be the best at the elite fighter school, Top Gun.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
description: After more than 30 years of service as one of the Navy’s top aviators, Maverick must train a new generation of pilots, including the son of his late best friend, while facing new personal and professional challenges.

title: Mission: Impossible
description: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent framed for the deaths of his team members, must uncover the true identity of the mole within his organization while trying to clear his name.

title: Mission: Impossible 2
description: Ethan Hunt is sent on a mission to retrieve a deadly biological weapon and prevent it from being sold to a group of terrorists, leading to an intense pursuit and dangerous confrontations.

title: Mission: Impossible 3
description: Ethan Hunt faces his most personal mission yet when a sadistic arms dealer kidnaps his wife, forcing him to confront a dangerous adversary and protect those he loves.

title: Mission: Impossible – Ghost Protocol
description: After being falsely accused of bombing the Kremlin, the IMF team must go rogue to stop a nuclear disaster, leading to a high-stakes mission involving espionage, betrayal, and danger.

title: Mission: Impossible – Rogue Nation
description: Ethan Hunt and his team must take down the Syndicate, a criminal organization planning global destruction, all while dealing with betrayal and an enigmatic new ally.

title: Mission: Impossible – Fallout
description: Ethan Hunt faces his most dangerous mission yet after an operation goes wrong, leading to a deadly race against time to prevent a nuclear catastrophe while navigating a web of betrayals.

title: Mission: Impossible – Dead Reckoning Part One
description: Ethan Hunt and his team are tasked with stopping a global threat, uncovering a dangerous conspiracy that puts them at odds with powerful enemies and forces them into impossible situations.

title: Jack Reacher
description: A former military police officer, Jack Reacher, investigates a sniper shooting in a small town, uncovering a larger conspiracy and taking on corrupt officials in his quest for justice.

title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
description: Jack Reacher returns to his old military headquarters to meet an old friend, only to find himself framed for a crime he didn’t commit, leading to a dangerous journey to clear his name.

title: Collateral
description: A taxi driver is forced to drive a hitman around Los Angeles as he carries out a series of assassinations, leading to a high-stakes battle for survival over the course of one night.

title: Knight and Day
description: A woman is swept into the world of espionage when she crosses paths with a secret agent on the run, leading to a whirlwind adventure filled with action, humor, and unexpected romance.

title: The Mummy
description: An ancient princess is awakened from her crypt beneath the desert, bringing with her a malevolent power that threatens to bring chaos to the world, forcing a team of explorers to battle supernatural forces.

title: Oblivion
description: In a post-apocalyptic future, a technician tasked with maintaining drones that protect Earth from alien invaders discovers a devastating secret about his mission and the true nature of the planet.

title: Edge of Tomorrow
description: A soldier relives the same day over and over after being killed in a battle with alien invaders, and must use his newfound time-loop ability to change the outcome and defeat the enemy.

title: American Made
description: Based on a true story, this film follows a commercial airline pilot who becomes a drug runner for the CIA and the Medellín Cartel, leading to a thrilling and dangerous double life.

title: Minority Report
description: In a future where crimes are prevented before they happen, a top officer is accused of a murder he has not yet committed, leading him on a quest to clear his name while uncovering a larger conspiracy.

title: War of the Worlds
description: A divorced father must protect his children when Earth is invaded by deadly alien tripods, fighting to survive in a world ravaged by extraterrestrial forces.

title: Valkyrie
description: Based on true events, this historical thriller follows a group of German officers who plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler during World War II and end the Nazi regime from within.

title: Titanic
description: A young couple from different social backgrounds fall in love aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic, culminating in a tragic and unforgettable romance set against the backdrop of the ship's fateful voyage.

title: The Departed
description: In this intense crime thriller, an undercover cop and a mole in the police force try to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston, leading to a dangerous game of cat and mouse.

title: Blood Diamond
description: In Sierra Leone during the civil war, a fisherman is forced to work with a mercenary and a journalist to recover a rare diamond that could change his life, while grappling with the devastating effects of conflict and child soldiers.

title: Shutter Island
description: A U.S. Marshal is sent to a mental asylum on an isolated island to investigate the disappearance of a patient, but as he digs deeper, he begins to question his own sanity and the sinister secrets surrounding the facility.

title: Inception
description: A skilled thief who enters the minds of others to steal secrets is tasked with planting an idea in a CEO's mind, leading to a mind-bending journey through dreams within dreams as he faces his own unresolved issues.

title: Django Unchained
description: A freed slave teams up with a German bounty hunter to rescue his wife from a ruthless plantation owner, navigating a violent journey of revenge in the antebellum South.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, a stockbroker who rises to immense wealth and power through corruption and fraud, only to face a dramatic downfall as his excesses and crimes catch up with him.

title: The Revenant
description: After being left for dead following a bear attack, frontiersman Hugh Glass embarks on a grueling journey of survival and revenge against those who abandoned him, set in the harsh wilderness of the American frontier.

title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
description: Set in 1969, this nostalgic film follows an aging TV actor and his stunt double as they navigate Hollywood’s changing landscape, intersecting with the real-life tragedy of the Manson Family murders.

title: Meet Joe Black
description: A wealthy businessman’s life is turned upside down when he meets a man who claims to be the personification of death, while forming an unexpected bond with his daughter.

title: Fight Club
description: A disillusioned office worker forms an underground fight club with a soap salesman, leading to an anarchistic and violent path as they challenge societal norms and personal identity.

title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
description: The extraordinary story of a man who is born old and ages backward, experiencing a life filled with love, loss, and the inevitable passage of time in a world that’s constantly changing.

title: Inglourious Basterds
description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a group of Jewish-American soldiers known as the 'Basterds' plot to assassinate high-ranking Nazi officials in a series of daring and violent missions.

title: World War Z
description: A former United Nations investigator is tasked with finding the source of a global zombie pandemic, leading him to search across the globe for a way to stop the outbreak and save humanity.

title: 12 Years a Slave
description: Based on a true story, this film follows Solomon Northup, a free black man who is abducted and sold into slavery, enduring years of unimaginable hardships in an effort to regain his freedom.

title: Fury
description: During the final days of World War II, a battle-hardened tank commander and his crew are tasked with a dangerous mission behind enemy lines, facing insurmountable odds as they fight for survival.

title: The Big Short
description: Based on the true story of the 2008 financial crisis, this film follows a group of outsiders who predict the housing market crash and bet against the system, exposing the greed and corruption that led to the collapse.

title: Allied
description: During World War II, two intelligence officers fall in love while on a mission to assassinate a German official in North Africa, but their relationship is tested when one of them is suspected of being a Nazi spy.

title: War Machine
description: A satirical drama that follows a four-star American general who is tasked with commanding the war in Afghanistan, but his high-profile campaign is met with political and media backlash.

title: Ad Astra
description: Astronaut Roy McBride embarks on a dangerous mission to the outer edges of the solar system to find his missing father, whose experiment threatens the survival of Earth.

title: Bullet Train
description: Five assassins aboard a fast-moving train discover that their individual assignments are interconnected, leading to a high-speed, action-packed fight for survival and revenge.

title: Independence Day
description: When an alien race attacks Earth, a group of unlikely heroes including a fighter pilot and a computer hacker must work together to launch a counterattack to save humanity.

title: Men in Black
description: A secret government agency, known as the Men in Black, is tasked with monitoring extraterrestrial activity on Earth. A new recruit teams up with a veteran agent to protect the world from alien threats.

title: Men in Black II
description: Agent J reunites with Agent K to stop a shape-shifting alien criminal who threatens the Earth. With K's memory erased, J must help him recover his past to save humanity.

title: I, Robot
description: In a future where robots are a common part of daily life, a detective investigates a murder that seems to have been committed by a robot, challenging the fundamental laws of robotics.

title: The Pursuit of Happyness
description: Based on a true story, a struggling salesman fights to build a better life for himself and his son while facing homelessness and personal challenges, driven by his determination to succeed.

title: I Am Legend
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a scientist believes he may hold the key to saving humanity from a virus that has turned most people into mutants. He battles isolation and danger while trying to find a cure.

title: Men in Black 3
description: Agent J travels back in time to the 1960s to prevent the assassination of his partner, Agent K, by a vengeful alien. He must work with a younger version of K to save the future and the world.

title: Aladdin
description: A live-action adaptation of the classic animated film, following a street-smart young man who discovers a magical genie that grants him three wishes. With the help of his friends, he must thwart an evil sorcerer.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, the Watergate scandal, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an extraordinary destiny, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

title: Saving Private Ryan
description: A group of American soldiers embark on a dangerous mission to find and bring home a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action during World War II.

title: Cast Away
description: A FedEx executive is stranded on a deserted island and must learn to survive while also grappling with the personal and emotional struggles that arise from his situation.

title: The Terminal
description: An Eastern European man becomes stranded at New York's JFK Airport, where he is forced to take up temporary residence until his homeland reopens after a coup.

title: The Polar Express
description: A young boy embarks on a magical train ride to the North Pole on Christmas Eve. Along the way, he learns about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

title: Captain Phillips
description: Based on the true story of Captain Richard Phillips, who was taken hostage by Somali pirates in 2009, and the U.S. Navy's daring rescue mission.

title: Sully
description: The story of Captain Chesley 'Sully' Sullenberger, who heroically landed his plane in the Hudson River, saving the lives of all 155 passengers on board.

title: Greyhound
description: A U.S. Navy commander must lead a convoy of Allied ships across the Atlantic while being pursued by German U-boats during World War II.

title: Finch
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a robotics engineer, his dog, and his robot set out on a journey across the country in search of safety.

title: The Notebook
description: A young couple falls in love during the early years of World War II, but circumstances and years later, they are reunited in a nursing home where their love story is read from a notebook.

title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
description: A man learns that his wife has been unfaithful and seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a bachelor who teaches him how to be a hit with the ladies.

title: Drive
description: A Hollywood stuntman who moonlights as a getaway driver finds himself pulled into a dangerous heist when a contract goes awry.

title: La La Land
description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love but struggle to maintain their relationship as they pursue their dreams in Los Angeles.

title: Blade Runner 2049
description: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for three decades.

title: First Man
description: A look at the life of the astronaut, Neil Armstrong, and the legendary space mission that led him to become the first man to walk on the Moon on July 20, 1969.

title: The Mummy Returns
description: Ten years after the events of the first film, Rick and Evelyn O'Connell are settled in London with their son, Alex. When Alex inadvertently awakens the cursed mummy Imhotep, the O'Connells must stop him from unleashing a deadly curse upon the world.

title: San Andreas
description: After the infamous San Andreas Fault triggers a massive earthquake in California, a rescue pilot makes a dangerous journey across the state in order to rescue his daughter.

title: Central Intelligence
description: A mild-mannered accountant is lured into the world of international espionage after reconnecting with an old high school friend who is now a CIA agent.

title: Baywatch
description: Devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon butts heads with a brash new recruit. Together, they uncover a local criminal plot that threatens the future of the Bay.

title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
description: Four high school students discover an old video game console and are transported into the game's jungle setting, becoming the adult avatars they chose.

title: Rampage
description: When three different animals become infected with a dangerous pathogen, a primatologist and a geneticist team up to stop them from destroying Chicago.

title: Skyscraper
description: A security expert is forced to find a way into a burning skyscraper, to rescue his wife and daughter.

title: Jumanji: The Next Level
description: The gang is back, but the game has changed. When Spencer goes back into the world of Jumanji, his friends follow him to bring him home.

title: Jungle Cruise
description: Dr. Lily Houghton enlists the aid of wisecracking skipper Frank Wolff to take her down the Amazon in his ramshackle-but-charming boat. Together, they search for an ancient tree that holds the power to heal.

title: Red Notice
description: An FBI agent reluctantly teams up with two art thieves to catch a criminal mastermind who’s been on the run for years.

title: Black Adam
description: Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with the almighty powers of the Egyptian gods, and imprisoned just as quickly, Black Adam is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world.

title: Speed
description: A young police officer is on a hunt for a bomb that is set to explode on a city bus if the speed drops below 50 mph.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: The Matrix Reloaded
description: Neo and the rebel leaders estimate that they have 72 hours until a fleet of sentient machines discovers Zion and destroys it.

title: The Matrix Revolutions
description: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo attempts to end the war and fulfill his destiny.

title: John Wick
description: An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to track down the men who took everything from him.

title: John Wick: Chapter 2
description: John Wick is forced out of retirement once again to fulfill a blood oath, but a dangerous conspiracy threatens to destroy everything he holds dear.

title: John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum
description: John Wick is on the run after killing a member of the international assassin's guild, and with a price on his head, he must fight his way through the underworld.

title: John Wick: Chapter 4
description: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating the High Table, but before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face the most lethal killers in the world.

title: Knock Knock
description: When a married man is visited by two stranded women, their flirtations turn dangerous as they begin to inflict extreme and violent punishment on him.

title: The Change-Up
description: A married man and a single man switch bodies, leading to a series of comedic situations as they experience each other's lives.

title: The Hitman's Bodyguard
description: A bodyguard is forced to work for a hitman he has sworn to protect, leading to a dangerous and humorous partnership.

title: Deadpool
description: A former special forces operative turned mercenary undergoes an experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers and a twisted sense of humor.

title: Deadpool 2
description: Deadpool forms a team of mutants to protect a young boy from a time-traveling soldier with a sinister agenda.

title: Free Guy
description: A bank teller discovers that he is a background character in an open-world video game and sets out to become the hero of his own story.

title: The Adam Project
description: A time-traveling pilot teams up with his younger self and his late father to come to terms with his past while saving the future.

title: Iron Man
description: After being kidnapped by terrorists, industrialist Tony Stark builds a high-tech suit of armor to escape and becomes the armored superhero Iron Man.

title: The Incredible Hulk
description: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. government, must find a cure for his unique condition before he is found by a military leader.

title: Iron Man 2
description: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark faces pressure from all sides to share his technology with the military. Unwilling to let go of his invention, Stark uncovers a dangerous new enemy and a deadly plot against him.

title: Thor
description: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of his home in Asgard and sent to Earth, where he becomes one of its finest defenders.

title: Captain America: The First Avenger
description: After being injected with a super-soldier serum, Steve Rogers becomes Captain America and leads the fight against the Red Skull, who wields a powerful artifact known as the Tesseract.

title: The Avengers
description: Nick Fury, director of S.H.I.E.L.D., assembles a team of superheroes to save the world from Loki and his army.

title: Iron Man 3
description: Tony Stark faces a new enemy, the Mandarin, and must rely on his ingenuity and instincts to protect those he loves.

title: Thor: The Dark World
description: Thor must team up with Loki to stop the Dark Elves from using a powerful weapon to destroy the Nine Realms.

title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
description: Captain America teams up with Black Widow and Falcon to expose a conspiracy within S.H.I.E.L.D., all while facing a mysterious assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
description: A group of misfits, including a human, an alien, a tree, and a raccoon, team up to stop a villain from taking over the galaxy using a powerful artifact.

title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
description: The Avengers must come together to stop the artificial intelligence, Ultron, who is bent on eradicating humanity.

title: Ant-Man
description: A small-time crook becomes the unlikely hero Ant-Man after being entrusted with the technology to shrink in size and communicate with ants.

title: Captain America: Civil War
description: The Avengers must battle each other after political pressure forces them to choose sides in a conflict between Iron Man and Captain America.

title: Doctor Strange
description: After a car accident ruins his hands, a renowned but arrogant surgeon learns the mystical arts to heal and unlock his potential as a sorcerer.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
description: The Guardians continue their cosmic adventures while dealing with family secrets and the emergence of a powerful new threat.

title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
description: After his encounter with the Avengers, Peter Parker must confront a new villain, the Vulture, while balancing his high school life and his responsibilities as Spider-Man.

title: Thor: Ragnarok
description: Thor teams up with Loki, Valkyrie, and the Hulk to escape from the planet Sakaar and stop Hela, the goddess of death, from destroying Asgard.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
description: The Avengers and their allies must assemble to stop Thanos, who is on a mission to collect all six Infinity Stones and bring destruction to the universe.

title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
description: As Scott Lang balances being both a superhero and a father, he teams up with Hope van Dyne to uncover secrets from the past and face a new threat.

title: Captain Marvel
description: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe’s most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once again to undo the damage caused by Thanos and save the universe.

title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
description: Peter Parker goes on a school trip to Europe, where he is confronted by a new threat, Mysterio, and must come to terms with his role as Spider-Man.

title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
description: Shang-Chi, a skilled martial artist, must confront his past and face the powerful organization known as the Ten Rings.

title: Eternals
description: The Eternals, a race of immortal beings, must come together to stop a cosmic threat while dealing with their own internal conflicts.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Peter Parker seeks help from Doctor Strange to erase everyone's memory of him being Spider-Man, but things go wrong, leading to a multiverse of threats.

title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
description: Doctor Strange teams up with America Chavez to navigate the multiverse and stop a dark force threatening to tear it apart.

title: Thor: Love and Thunder
description: Thor embarks on a quest to stop the villain Gorr the God Butcher, with the help of his allies and his ex-girlfriend Jane Foster, who wields Mjolnir.

title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
description: Scott Lang and Hope van Dyne embark on a journey into the Quantum Realm, where they encounter new threats and uncover secrets about the mysterious Kang the Conqueror.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
description: The Guardians of the Galaxy reunite to rescue one of their own and face new challenges, as they confront their past and an impending cosmic threat.

title: The Marvels
description: Carol Danvers, Monica Rambeau, and Kamala Khan team up to stop an intergalactic threat while navigating their respective powers and connections to the universe.

title: The Guardians of the Galaxy Holiday Special
description: The Guardians of the Galaxy celebrate Christmas in their own way, embarking on a fun-filled holiday adventure as they spread festive cheer across the universe.

title: Man of Steel
description: Clark Kent, one of the last of an extinguished race disguised as an unremarkable human, is forced to reveal his identity when Earth is invaded by an army of survivors who threaten to bring the planet to the brink of destruction.

title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
description: Fearing the actions of Superman, Gotham City’s own formidable, forceful vigilante, Batman, takes on Metropolis’s most revered, modern-day savior while the world wrestles with what sort of hero it really needs.

title: Suicide Squad
description: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force with their most dangerous missions yet.

title: Wonder Woman
description: When an American pilot crashes on her sheltered island paradise, Diana leaves her home to fight a war, discovering her full powers…and true destiny.

title: Justice League
description: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman’s selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.

title: Aquaman
description: Arthur Curry, the human-born heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, is forced to step forward to reclaim his birthright as Aquaman and face his half-brother Orm, who seeks to unite the seven kingdoms against the surface world.

title: Shazam!
description: A newly fostered young boy in a group home discovers he can magically transform into an adult superhero in times of need with a single magic word.

title: Joker
description: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. As his alter ego, Joker, begins to take shape, he embarks on a journey that leads to chaos.

title: Wonder Woman 1984
description: Diana Prince comes into conflict with the formidable villainess Cheetah while also confronting her past in a world obsessed with greed and power.

title: Zack Snyder’s Justice League
description: The Justice League must team up to stop the alien Steppenwolf from conquering Earth, but they are faced with personal challenges, and doubts about the strength of their alliance.

title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
description: Shazam and his foster family face a new threat as the daughters of Atlas unleash their power on the world. The team must come together to defeat the ancient gods.

title: The Flash
description: Barry Allen travels through time to prevent his mother's death, but inadvertently causes changes that lead to the arrival of alternate universes and alternate versions of heroes.

title: Contagion
description: A deadly virus rapidly spreads worldwide, causing global panic and chaos as scientists and doctors race to find a cure and control the outbreak.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival as Earth faces environmental collapse.

title: The Martian
description: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after a space mission goes awry and must figure out how to survive while awaiting rescue.

title: Ford v Ferrari
description: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford to challenge Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

title: American Psycho
description: A wealthy New York investment banking executive hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his circle of friends. As his insanity grows, he begins to lose his grip on reality, leading to violent and erratic behavior.

title: Batman Begins
description: After witnessing his parents' murder as a child, billionaire Bruce Wayne travels the world to understand the nature of crime. He returns to Gotham City to fight crime as the masked vigilante known as Batman.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces his greatest psychological and physical tests when he faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to plunge Gotham City into anarchy.

title: American Hustle
description: A con man and his seductive partner are forced to work for a wild FBI agent, who pushes them into a world of Jersey powerbrokers and mafia.

title: The Machinist
description: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity when a new co-worker appears and begins to interfere with his life.

title: Taken
description: A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris.

title: Taken 2
description: In Istanbul, retired CIA operative Bryan Mills and his wife are taken hostage by the father of a kidnapper Mills killed while rescuing his daughter.

title: Taken 3
description: Ex-covert operative Bryan Mills is accused of a murder he didn't commit and must use his particular set of skills to track down the real killers and clear his name.

title: Non-Stop
description: An air marshal springs into action during a transatlantic flight after receiving a series of text messages threatening the lives of passengers unless a ransom is paid.

title: The Commuter
description: A businessman is caught up in a criminal conspiracy during his daily commute home and is forced to uncover the identity of a hidden passenger before the last train stop.

title: Men in Black: International
description: The Men in Black have always protected the Earth from the scum of the universe. In this new adventure, they tackle their biggest, most global threat to date: a mole in the Men in Black organization.

title: Casino Royale
description: James Bond's first 007 mission leads him to Le Chiffre, a banker to the world's terrorists. Bond's target is to defeat Le Chiffre in a high-stakes poker game at Casino Royale, Montenegro, to prevent him from winning back his clients' money.

title: Quantum of Solace
description: James Bond seeks revenge for the death of his lover, Vesper Lynd, leading him to uncover a sinister organization known as Quantum, which is plotting to control the world's water supply.

title: Skyfall
description: Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. As MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.

title: Looper
description: In a future where time travel exists but is illegal, a hired gun is forced to confront his older self when his latest target turns out to be his future self.

title: Spectre
description: A cryptic message from Bond's past sends him on a trail to uncover a sinister organization known as SPECTRE, leading him to a confrontation with its enigmatic leader, Ernst Stavro Blofeld.

title: Knives Out
description: A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family, uncovering a web of lies and deceit.

title: No Time to Die
description: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when his old friend Felix Leiter from the CIA turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

title: Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery
description: Detective Benoit Blanc travels to Greece to peel back the layers of a mystery surrounding a tech billionaire and his eclectic group of friends.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Kill Bill: Volume 1
description: After waking from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

title: Kill Bill: Volume 2
description: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

title: The Hateful Eight
description: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a stagecoach stopover, but they aren't alone.

title: Gladiator
description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: A Beautiful Mind
description: The story of John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, and his struggles with schizophrenia.

title: The Pope's Exorcist
description: Inspired by the files of Father Gabriele Amorth, Chief Exorcist of the Vatican, the film follows his investigations into a young boy's terrifying possession.

title: The Hangover
description: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They must retrace their steps to find him.

title: The Hangover Part II
description: The Wolfpack reunites for a wedding in Thailand, but things go awry, leading to another wild adventure.

title: American Sniper
description: The story of Navy SEAL sniper Chris Kyle, whose pinpoint accuracy saves countless lives on the battlefield and turns him into a legend.

title: A Star Is Born
description: A musician helps a young singer find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

title: The Hangover Part III
description: This time, there's no wedding. No bachelor party. What could go wrong, as the Wolfpack travels to Tijuana to help a friend in need?

title: Undisputed II: Last Man Standing
description: Heavyweight champion George 'Iceman' Chambers is sent to a Russian prison on trumped-up drug charges. To win his freedom, he must fight the prison's top fighter, Yuri Boyka, in a deadly underground tournament.

title: Undisputed III: Redemption
description: After a brutal fight, Yuri Boyka is left crippled and imprisoned in a Russian jail. He seeks redemption by entering a deadly tournament where the winner earns their freedom.

title: Boyka: Undisputed
description: Yuri Boyka, a former prison fighter, is given a chance at freedom if he can win a series of underground fights. He faces off against a new opponent, a deadly fighter named Koshmar.

title: Spider-Man
description: When Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically modified spider, he gains superhuman abilities and becomes the web-slinging superhero, Spider-Man. He must face the evil Green Goblin, who threatens New York City.

title: Spider-Man 2
description: Peter Parker struggles to balance his life as a student and a superhero, while facing a new villain, Doctor Octopus, who is terrorizing the city.

title: Spider-Man 3
description: Peter Parker faces new challenges as he encounters the Sandman and the symbiotic Venom, while dealing with the emotional turmoil of his personal life.

title: The Social Network
description: The story of Facebook's creation and the legal battles that followed, focusing on Mark Zuckerberg's rise and the controversies surrounding the social media platform's origins.

title: The Amazing Spider-Man
description: A reboot of the Spider-Man franchise, following Peter Parker as he discovers his powers and uncovers the mystery of his parents' disappearance, while facing the threat of the Lizard.

title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
description: Peter Parker faces new challenges as he battles Electro, a former Oscorp employee turned villain, and confronts the return of his childhood friend, Harry Osborn, who becomes the Green Goblin.

title: Hacksaw Ridge
description: The true story of Desmond Doss, a medic who served in the Battle of Okinawa without carrying a weapon, becoming the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help the Perron family, who are experiencing disturbing events in their farmhouse.

title: The Conjuring 2
description: The Warrens travel to London to investigate the haunting of the Hodgson family, encountering the demonic entity known as the Crooked Man.

title: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It
description: The Warrens investigate a murder suspect who claims demonic possession as a defense, leading to a chilling case.

title: The Nun
description: A priest and a novice nun uncover an unholy secret in a Romanian monastery, leading them to confront the demonic force known as Valak.

title: Annabelle
description: A couple's life is turned upside down when their home is invaded by satanic cultists, who target their newborn daughter and the doll Annabelle.

title: Annabelle: Creation
description: A dollmaker and his wife welcome a nun and several girls from a shuttered orphanage into their home, where they become the target of the dollmaker's possessed creation.

title: Annabelle Comes Home
description: The Warrens' daughter, Judy, and her babysitters encounter the possessed doll Annabelle, leading to terrifying events.

title: The Curse of La Llorona
description: A social worker and her children are targeted by the malevolent spirit La Llorona, leading them to seek help from a priest.

title: Hereditary
description: A family uncovers dark secrets about their ancestry, leading to terrifying revelations.

title: Get Out
description: A Black man visits his white girlfriend's family estate, where he uncovers disturbing secrets.

title: The Invitation
description: A man attends a dinner party hosted by his ex-wife and her new husband, where unsettling events unfold.

title: Don't Breathe
description: Three friends break into a blind man's house, thinking it's an easy target, but they soon realize he's not as helpless as he seems.

title: Don't Breathe 2
description: The blind man has been living in isolation for years, but his life is disrupted when a group kidnaps a young girl from his home.

title: A Quiet Place
description: A family lives in silence to avoid blind creatures with acute hearing that hunt by sound.

title: A Quiet Place Part II
description: The Abbott family faces the terrors of the outside world as they continue their fight for survival in silence.

title: Malignant
description: A woman experiences visions of murders committed by a mysterious figure, leading her to uncover her dark past.

title: Ready or Not
description: A newlywed is forced to participate in a deadly game of hide and seek with her husband's wealthy family.

title: The Dead Room
description: A team of paranormal investigators is sent to a farmhouse to investigate reports of a haunting.

title: Demonic
description: The story follows Detective Mark Lewis and psychologist Dr. Elizabeth Klein as they investigate a violent incident in an abandoned Louisiana mansion. Three college students are found dead, and the sole survivor, John Matthews, recounts a séance that summoned malevolent spirits. As the investigation unfolds, the team uncovers a sinister plot involving demonic possession.

title: Us
description: A family's serene beach vacation turns to chaos when their doppelgangers appear and begin to terrorize them.

title: Speak No Evil
description: A family encounters terrifying, unexplainable phenomena after visiting a remote village.

title: Amityville: The Awakening
description: A family moves into a new home in Amityville, unaware of the horrifying events linked to the house's past.

title: The Invisible Man
description: A woman escapes her abusive relationship, only to be stalked by her supposedly deceased partner, who uses invisible technology to torment her.

title: Evil Dead
description: Five friends travel to a remote cabin in the woods, where they accidentally unleash a demonic force that turns them against each other.

title: Ghost Rider
description: A stunt motorcyclist makes a pact with the devil to save his father and becomes the Ghost Rider, a supernatural vigilante.

title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
description: Johnny Blaze, a man cursed with the power of the Ghost Rider, is forced to confront his past when he must save a young boy from the devil.

title: Uncharted
description: Nathan Drake, a treasure hunter, embarks on an adventure with a seasoned adventurer to uncover historical artifacts and solve long-forgotten mysteries.

title: Zodiac
description: Based on the true story of the Zodiac killer, the film follows a cartoonist and journalists as they try to uncover the identity of the elusive serial killer.

title: Due Date
description: A man must travel cross-country with an eccentric companion to make it to the birth of his child, facing hilarious and often ridiculous obstacles along the way.

title: Passengers
description: Two passengers aboard a spaceship traveling to a distant colony planet are awakened from cryogenic sleep 90 years too early and must find a way to survive.

title: The Tomorrow War
description: A high school teacher is recruited to join a war in the future where the fate of humanity is at stake. Along with soldiers from the future, he fights alien invaders.

title: Jurassic Park
description: A group of scientists are invited to an island where dinosaurs have been brought back to life, but chaos ensues when the creatures escape.

title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
description: When a remote island is discovered to harbor dinosaurs, a team is sent to investigate, but they find themselves facing the terrifying creatures.

title: Jurassic Park III
description: A new expedition to the island of Jurassic Park leads to chaos once again when the team discovers the dangerous dinosaurs still roam the land.

title: Jurassic World
description: A new theme park featuring genetically modified dinosaurs opens to the public, but when a dangerous new breed of dinosaur is unleashed, it sets off a chain of destruction.

title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
description: As the island's volcano threatens the remaining dinosaurs, Claire and Owen return to rescue the creatures, but they uncover a conspiracy that threatens their survival.

title: Jurassic World: Dominion
description: Dinosaurs now live freely across the world, causing an uneasy co-existence with humanity. A new threat emerges as humans and dinosaurs clash for survival.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: Harry Potter, a young boy, learns that he is a wizard and attends a magical school where he uncovers dark secrets about his past and faces a dangerous adversary.

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
description: In his second year at Hogwarts, Harry discovers a hidden chamber where a terrifying creature threatens the lives of students and the school's future.

title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
description: Harry learns that a dangerous criminal, Sirius Black, has escaped from Azkaban prison and is believed to be after him. As he investigates, he uncovers surprising truths.

title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
description: Harry is unexpectedly entered into a dangerous magical tournament. As he faces life-threatening challenges, he uncovers the dark forces that are rising once again.

title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
description: Harry and his friends form 'Dumbledore's Army' to fight against the return of Lord Voldemort, but the Ministry of Magic refuses to acknowledge the threat.

title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
description: Harry continues his education at Hogwarts while uncovering dark secrets about Lord Voldemort’s past. He prepares for the inevitable war and his destiny.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows – Part 1
description: Harry, Ron, and Hermione set out to find and destroy Voldemort's Horcruxes in order to defeat him once and for all, leading them into dangerous territory.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows – Part 2
description: The final battle between Harry Potter and Lord Voldemort comes to a head as Harry discovers the true meaning of the Deathly Hallows and prepares for the ultimate showdown.

title: Creed
description: Adonis Creed, the son of Apollo Creed, seeks out Rocky Balboa to help him train for a shot at the heavyweight championship.

title: Creed II
description: Adonis Creed faces the challenge of defending his title against Viktor Drago, the son of Ivan Drago, the man who killed his father in the ring.

title: Creed III
description: Adonis Creed faces his greatest challenge yet when a former childhood friend emerges, leading to a fight that could change his life forever.

title: Jumanji
description: A magical board game brings the jungle to life, and two kids must help an adult player finish the game to stop the chaos it has caused.

title: Avatar
description: On the lush alien world of Pandora, a paraplegic ex-Marine becomes part of the Avatar program, where his mind inhabits a genetically engineered Na'vi body.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
description: Jake Sully and Neytiri must navigate their family’s challenges while encountering new threats on the aquatic world of Pandora in this sequel to the original Avatar.

title: Train to Busan
description: A man and his daughter must survive a zombie outbreak on a train to Busan, as the world around them crumbles to chaos.

title: Happy Death Day
description: A college student finds herself reliving the day of her murder over and over again, trying to identify her killer and escape the time loop.
